title: New: HAPPY TRENDY – January 6
content:
Ahead of his upcoming EU tour with Foxes In Fiction, synth-pop maestro HAPPY TRENDY has dropped a new cut (premiered via our friends at BIRP) set to feature on next’s week Die Young EP. January 6 is a glitchy lo-fi tune, seeing Dylan Khotin-Foote and Rachel Levy doubling up on vocal duties. Sonically, it brings about memories of Casiotone For The Painfully Alone, albeit bringing the sound into a more modern perspective. “Barely slept last night, half awake, eyes half closed, as the sun hits your face” being one particular moment that’s as heartbreaking as it is uplifting. Check out January 6 below, available via Orchid Tapes on November 20, as well as HAPPY TRENDY‘s full set of EU tour dates with Foxes In Fiction.
